PROS: Es un juegaco! muy entretenido jugar como asesino, la esencia de ir cortando espaldas mientras los survivors huyen como pollos descabezados.
Un juego que a mi, por lo menos, me pone tensisimo ser survivor, no sabes cuando veras a Myer detras de ti, acosandote..
Ni tampoco cuando te comeras una de esas trampas de la bruja, que te hacen pegar un saltito de la silla.. el juego esta muy bien, brutal!

CONTRAS: La gente que lo juega.. solo juego partidas contra asesinos camperos de miercoles.. Que juegan con El Espectro, te cuelgan el en gancho, se vuelve invisible y se te queda a tu puto lado, soplandote la oreja, esperando que vengan, los otros 3 idiotas, que no suelen salvarte tampoco, para matarlos.. 
Y no solo con El Espectro, suele pasar con cualquier asesino, luego los llamas camperos, y se las dan de pros mlg dorito noscope 360... pocas partidas suelo disfrutar como survivor, nose pero tanto le cuesta a la gente no ser tan mierdass??!
Bello ma vanno risolte ancora diverse cose!

I state that i have more than 130 hours of gameplay, and maybe i've understood the problems of this game, i will list them all:
The first thing (thats really easy to fix) is the matchmaking. How can i escape if i'm a rank 12 against a killer rank 1? So a balancing would be sweet.
Another critical point are bugs. It's really frustrating being always hit when it surpass a barricade for example, or being grabbed when it's taking the hatch.
In conclusion I think this game has a good idea in itself, but also has a bad developers team, that think only to make DLC (that are bugged, of course), and they have never thought to solve these CRITICAL issues. That's why I don't recommend this game.
it's a great game, but when i go to public matches i'm not able to add friends. it's getting to be a pain and my friend has the same problem on his game.

Edit: Fixed! :)

Very buggy lobby. I can't play as killer with my friend, and 1/10 times the game crashes in the lobby. Despite these issues my friend and I both experience, they have released a number of DLC. Why create DLC when you can polish your game? I wouldn't support developers like this and I wouldn't recommend this game.
Un juego bastante divertido, lo recomiendo ;)

The devs don't care about you, they don't care about your voice or thoughts. They certainly don't care about your experience in game also. This started back when they stopped doing weekly devs streams, ever since then it's been nothing but a downhill slide from there. 

The recent update has forever hurt the game even more so for those who solo q (I feel for ya) This game is in such a sad state after 6+ years. All the feedback during PTB's given back are never heard. We're simply here just to buy their DLC's and not be heard. I don't tolerate this behavior from a gaming company that makes the earnings it does. 

All the Devs that actually cared for the game left sadly to work at other places. Don't blame them either. 

Love this game but sadly the Devs don't anymore and it shows.

The Game is Really Fun espcially with friends, though the game has got less and less scary over the years since they always brighten up the lighting every update instead of making it scarier or darker its still a very fun game to play around iconic killers. The only flaws are perks on survivors are easily nerfed very early because killers cant counterplay them and the devs listen to unexperienced killers or new players for complaints, other flaw is devs sometimes put overpowered perks on both sides without thinking of how it will play and people pay money for the dlc perks to use them only to get nerfed to garbage after a week or 2. Other flaw is every update they break something in the game either something important like game mechanics or looks wise or even both sometimes and they take awhile to fix most things, they rather add more content then fix things that are more important but notings perfect so its a pretty good job so far.

Game is a lot of fun... when you can get it to run.  I spend roughly 60% of my time trying to first connect to a server, then reastarting the client itself before I even get a chance to play.  The fact that I spend so much time trying to play a game that is so broken should speak for itself in terms of how good the game can be, but the devs really should fix this.
***EDIT***
This game is adicttive and fun.  yes it has its problems with some minor balancing issues but two years later I am still playing.

I have been playing this game since before the Micheal Myers DLC and its heartbreaking to see this game turn to shiet so fast by the dev team. The devs have no idea how to run this game because none of them even play it on the daily! They're too busy adding dlcs and banning random people for little to no reason that all these new exploits are being used. I have atleast 5 exploits to get me into a place the killer can't hit me in. I can't believe this game is still alive and I wish it died because nothing new is being added like the devs said a year ago! It sucks being apart of this game for so long and having so much fun to see it become so bad. The community is so much worse because of how many things are being added that are just disgusting. I can bully most of the killers I play against and who cares. I'm extremely toxic and no ban for me but with the big streamers they get banned for nothing. This game is terrible now. 

PS: I would not buy the game at this point it's complete hell for newbies.

yes very fun good game
i like very much
quality

There are multiple reasons why I am not recommending this game.
-Takes forever to find matches with friends.
-75% of the time my friends and I find a match it kicks us or one of us out before the round starts
-the killer is the host so if the host has bad internet everyone is affected.
-also since the killer is the host and the killer disconnects the game ends, so if you were waiting 15 minutes to find a match and the killer rage quits, the game will end even if you didnt get much points so you wasted 15-20 minutes for nothing.
I'd love to give this game a thumbs up, its great to play these kinds of games with friends, but the match making takes too long to be worth playing. everytime my friends and i try to play we end up playing for 3 complete games in 4 hours... not worth the time...

Have been following the game since it was released on Steam, back before the Nurse was launched. bought it this December to start playing it and it was one of the best decisions I had. Amazing game, the terrifying factor syncs with the adrenaline quite well, and just the feeling of getting a double pip is incredible.
Tremendo uego para los que les gustan sentir el temor y de que alguien este asechando. Su ambiente pega mucho y tambien su banda sonora.

Imagine playing a game for the first time as a survivor.  You are expected to be as good as your teammates that have 1000+ Hours played.  They will call you the worst names they can think of to really get under your skin.  If you don't play this game any other way than theirs they will destroy you verbally.  Then they will attack your steam profile with derogatory comments.

Now imagine playing this game as a Killer.  You will be teabagged and harassed in game and out.  Post game chat will be either you being a noob and you should kill yourself.  Nothing constructive in there.  Then you get to the point where you get decent at killer, you will be labeled as a try hard and told to kill yourself.

All of the good cosmetic items are behind a paywall.  Some things can be bought with in game currency but they all are pretty basic crap.

7/10
this is an amazing horror game. i highly suggest if you like horror games watch a vid and consider getting this game.

Excelente jogo para o pre√ßo pedido.
Conteudo novo praticamente todos os meses.
Jogabilidade muito boa.
Facil de aprender mas dificil de se dominar.
Cada sess√£o dura 10-20 minutos pelo que apela tanto a jogadores casuais quanto hardcore.

J√° vou com 180 horas dedicadas a este jogo e continuo a querer mais!
Aconcelho a todos os jogadores que gostem de multiplayer assimetrico, com um tema de terror e um estilo hide and seek.
O inicio √© mais dificil tanto como sobrevivente quanto killer, mas ha medida que se progride desbloqueiam-se habilidades que tornam o jogo mais interessante.
As personagens s√£o variadas com formas de jogar distintas o que fomenta a longevidade de Dead by Daylight.

The devs are more worried in releasing DLCs than fixing the issues with the game.

Matchmaking is broken, Rank 20s survivors being put together with Rank 1 Killers and vice versa.
Infinite loading screen when starting a match. 
Survivors and killers rage quitting and not being punished for it.

Although a fun game to play with FRIENDS (randoms are just a no-go), I cannot recommend Dead by Daylight.

It is a sad day for me to declare DBD is officially broken. Patch after patch, one after another. Fixing one issue creates several more. It should be called Buggy by daylight. The game now constantly gets stuck in a loading screen both in joining a lobby and when entering into a game.  When you finally get into a match the loading screen takes so long. That most people dump out. I have been loaded into a playing field with only 2 survivors and the killer so many times lately. It is sad!  It's no longer worth the time it takes to get into a match. I loved this game when it first came out, but now DON'T  waste your money on it. Unless you like paying for frustrations galore.
n√£o consigo jogar aparece erro sempre

Even after 50 hours,  I can't think of anything positive to say about this game. Out of the past 6 times I've tried to start the game, it's crashed or froze 6 times. Even for $20 this is unnaceptable. 

The one thing they have nailed is the tension of hiding from a killer, but the gameplay and game itself are a mess. 

Imagine playing a multiplayer game where every single action (fight/struggle, interact with object, use object, etc.) are all mapped to one button. Then, imagine your ultimate goal in the match is to stand in place 4-5 times for 60 second intervals watching a progress bar slowly fill and hope the killer doesn't find you. It's just as boring as it sounds. 

As for the role of killer, your job is to chase four survivors around a jagged, unpolished map. The issue is that to complete your task, you need to keep eyes on the vitcim until they're entirely dead. This encourages camping and ruins the game for surviors, since the survivors are disadvantaged by losing a teammate and have no way to damage the killer. Even if your vision is briefly stunned by a flashlight, its easy to follow a wounded survivor and throw them back on the hook. It gets old fast for survivors, but it becomes frustrating and tedious to chase skilled survivors as the killer too. 

TL;DR: The gameplay is just incredibly shallow and is almost intentionally designed to cause infuriating situations and rage quits. 

I have no faith in the developers ability or desire to polish the game. They're more concerned with adding paid content than fixing the game breaking bugs that riddle the game. Every new content release only makes it worse, which shows a lack of internal testing or concern on the part of the developers-- even after they've decided to milk you for an extra six bucks to get new killers/survivors. 

It's fun for parties or an occasional scare, but overall it's not worth your time. Wait for Friday the 13th instead.

Gleichzeitig ist der Nervenkitzek hoch, sich vor dem Killer verstecken zu m√ºssen und trotzdem seine Aufgaben zu l√∂sen.

Die M√∂glichkeit mit mehreren Freunden zusammen zu spielen, hat mich zum Kauf dieses Spiels bewegt.
Sobald man allerdings mit mehr als einem Freund zusammen in der Lobby ist und ein Spiel sucht, dauert dieses teilweise eine halbe Stunde und l√§nger (falls man √ºberhaupt ein Match findet), um eine Lobby mit anderen zu finden.

Aggiornate e ampliate il gioco, sistemate i problemi, e forse 20 euro li varr√† tutti se non di pi√π. Alla fine √® un semplice multiplayer.
